Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the content of the protest sign by adding the words "Killing All White People" which were digitally manipulated.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence to support the assertion that the sign in the photograph actually existed as described.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the manipulated image accurately represents the original sign, without considering the possibility of manipulation or alteration.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim fails to consider alternative explanations for the content of the original sign, which simply read "Ending White Supremacy Starts with White People."
